ingredients_list: cabbage,olive oil, or as needed,onion, thinly sliced,chopped green bell pepper,green onion, sliced,whole Scotch bonnet chile pepper,fresh thyme,salt (Optional),shredded carrots,white vinegar,white sugar
direction_list:
Peel tough outer leaves from cabbage. Core the head and shred cabbage; set aside.
, Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; add onion, bell pepper, and green onion. Cook and stir vegetables until softened, about 5 minutes. Mix in Scotch bonnet pepper, thyme, and salt.
, Stir cabbage and carrots into onion mixture until thoroughly combined. Cover the skillet and reduce heat to medium-low. Cook, stirring occasionally, until cabbage starts to soften, about 10 minutes.
, Stir in vinegar and sugar. Cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 3 more minutes. Discard Scotch bonnet pepper and thyme before serving.

ingredients_list: red cabbage, shredded,water,salt to taste,brown sugar,caraway seeds,vinegar,butter
direction_list:
Place cabbage in a medium saucepan. Add water and salt and bring to a boil. Stir in brown sugar and caraway seeds; cook until cabbage is tender, about 12 minutes. Drain.
, Toss cabbage with vinegar and butter in a medium bowl until thoroughly coated.

ingredients_list: olive oil,carrots, thinly sliced,onion, thinly sliced,green cabbage, shredded,sea salt,ground black pepper,ground cumin, or to taste,ground turmeric, or to taste,potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
direction_list:
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add carrots and onion; cook and stir until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes. Stir in cabbage, salt, pepper, cumin, and turmeric; cook for 15 to 20 minutes.
, Add potatoes; reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook until potatoes are soft, about 20 minutes.

recipe_name: Grilled Pattypan Squash With Garlic Butter
ingredients_list: unsalted butter, softened,parsley,garlic, finely minced,kosher salt, divided,black pepper, divided,squash,olive oil
direction_list:
Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high (400 to 450 degrees F; 200 to 230 degrees C). Stir together butter, parsley, garlic, and 1/4 teaspoon each of the salt and pepper in a small bowl. Set aside.
, For larger pieces of pattypan squash, trim stem ends and cut into quarters or wedges. For smaller squash, cut in half.
, Toss together cut squash, olive oil, and remaining 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Place pieces of squash on oiled grates, and grill, undisturbed, until they release easily from the grill with distinct grill marks, 3 to 5 minutes. Flip squash, and continue to cook until tender and cooked on each side, about 5 minutes more. Place in a shallow dish for serving.
, Top hot grilled squash with garlic butter, and serve immediately.
,Dotdash Meredith Video Studios

ingredients_list: leftover mashed potatoes, cooled,egg,all-purpose flour,salt,vegetable oil, or as needed
direction_list:
Mix mashed potatoes, egg, flour, and salt in a bowl until well combined.
, Heat a thin layer of vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
, Working in batches, drop 1/6 of the potato mixture into the hot frying pan and flatten into a patty. Repeat to add more patties to the pan. Cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side.

ingredients_list: carrots, peeled,olive oil,salt,ground black pepper to taste,honey,balsamic vinegar,dried thyme,lemon juice,garlic, pressed,chopped parsley, or to taste
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Trim the ends off carrots and cut diagonally into thirds. If the carrots are large, cut lengthwise first and then diagonally into thirds. You want all the carrots to be about the same size.
, Combine olive oil, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Spread out carrots on the baking sheet, and drizzle with olive oil mixture until all are coated.
, Bake in the preheated oven until tender and starting to brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
, Meanwhile, whisk honey, balsamic vinegar, thyme, lemon juice, and garlic in the same bowl you used for the oil, and set aside.
, Remove carrots from the oven, drizzle with honey balsamic mixture until all are coated, and return to the oven for 5 minutes. If you have any leftover honey balsamic glaze, just drizzle over the roasted carrots.
, Top with a sprinkling of chopped parsley and serve.

ingredients_list: unsalted butter,corn kernels, thawed and drained,lime juice,chili powder,mayonnaise,cotija cheese,chopped cilantro, or to taste,lime wedges (optional)
direction_list:
Melt butter in a soup pot over medium-high heat, and cook corn until hot, about 8 minutes.
, Stir in lime juice and chili powder; cook until lime juice is nearly evaporated, about 2 minutes. Fold in mayonnaise and cook 2 minutes more. Turn off heat.
, Spoon into serving cups and top with cotija and cilantro. Serve with lime wedges.

ingredients_list: bacon, or more to taste,potatoes, or more to taste, peeled and cut into chunks,butter, cut into pieces,sour cream,shredded Cheddar cheese,chopped fresh chives (Optional),salt and ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Gather the ingredients.
, Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until crisp and browned, about 10 minutes; drain on paper towels.
, Meanwhile, place potatoes into a large pot of lightly salted water and bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain well and return potatoes to the pot.
, Mash butter into the potatoes using a potato masher or electric hand mixer until well combined. Add sour cream and continue to mash or beat until combined. Crumble bacon into potato mixture; stir in Cheddar cheese and chives. Season with salt and pepper.
,Grocery Addict

ingredients_list: assorted mushrooms ,canola oil,butter,garlic, minced,beef broth,red wine,sour cream,chopped ,fresh parsley,kosher salt,freshly ground black pepper
direction_list:
Heat oil and butter in an extra-large skillet over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and just tender, about 10 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add broth and wine; bring to a boil. Cook, uncovered, until liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes.
, Remove from heat. Add sour cream and parsley; toss to coat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Serve over toast and garnish with parsley.

recipe_name: Crispy Polenta Bites with Jammy Tomato Topper
ingredients_list: diced tomatoes, drained,raisins,red wine,honey,balsamic vinegar,chopped fresh thyme, plus more for garnish,salt,polenta,olive oil, goat cheese
direction_list:
Put a rimmed baking sheet in oven. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
, Bring tomatoes, raisins, and red wine to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low; simmer mixture, uncovered, until raisins are plump and most of liquid has evaporated, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, thyme, and salt.
, Meanwhile, slice polenta into 1/4-inch-thick rounds. Gently toss polenta with oil in a large bowl. Remove baking sheet from oven. Arrange rounds in an even layer on baking sheet.Â 
, Bake polenta rounds in the preheated oven, turning halfway through, until lightly golden and crisp on both sides, about 15 minutes.
, To serve, top polenta rounds with goat cheese and tomato mixture. Garnish with thyme. Serve warm or at room temperature.
,Vegan-ize: Replace honey with agave syrup, use a vegan wine, omit goat cheese, add top bites with 2 to 3 tablespoons toasted pine nuts.Â ,Make it Meaty: Top polenta bites with 3 ounces (about 5 slices) crisp-cooked and chopped prosciutto.

recipe_name: Warm Green Bean Salad with Bacon
ingredients_list: fresh green beans, ends trimmed,bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces,red onion, halved and thinly sliced,red wine vinegar,ijon mustard,honey,salt and freshly ground pepper to taste,hard boiled egg, quartered (optional),lemon wedges
direction_list:
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and add green beans. Cook until bright green and tender crisp, 4 to 5 minutes; do not overcook. Drain beans, rinse with cold water, and set aside.
, Add bacon pieces to a skillet over medium heat, and cook until crispy. Remove bacon to a paper-towel to drain, but leave bacon drippings in the skillet.
, Add onions, and sautÃ© until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in red wine vinegar, Dijon, and honey.
, Add green beans and cooked bacon to the skillet and stir until well combined. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
, Serve warm with wedges of lemon and a hard boiled egg wedge.

ingredients_list: butter,red cabbage, cored and thinly sliced,salt to taste,water,red wine,red wine vinegar, or to taste,white sugar,caraway seeds
direction_list:
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook cabbage in hot butter until it begins to soften, 1 to 2 minutes. Season with salt to taste. Pour in water, red wine, and red wine vinegar; stir to combine. Mix in sugar and caraway seeds.
, Continue to cook and stir until liquid has evaporated and cabbage is tender, about 5 minutes. If cabbage isn't quite tender, add a splash of water and continue cooking a few more minutes.

ingredients_list: broccoli florets,olive oil,kosher salt,grated Parmesan cheese,lemon zest
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
, On a half-sheet pan, toss broccoli florets with olive oil and kosher salt. Spread out evenly on the pan.
, Roast broccoli in the preheated oven until tender, 20 to 25 minutes.
, Sprinkle broccoli with Parmesan cheese and lemon zest. Return to the oven until cheese is melted and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Keep a close eye!

ingredients_list: bacon, chopped,russels sprouts, ,shallot, finely chopped,half-and-half,Dijon mustard,grated Parmesan cheese,white Cheddar cheese, divided,garlic powder,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
, Add bacon to an ovenproof skillet over medium heat, and cook until crispy, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer bacon to a paper towel to drain, leaving bacon grease in skillet.
, Place the sprouts cut side down in the skillet, and cook for about 4 minutes over medium heat, being careful not to burn. Flip when the sprouts start to brown. Add shallots to the sprouts, and cook for an additional 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from the skillet, and wipe the skillet clean.
, Whisk half-and-half and Dijon in the skillet, and stir in Parmesan, half of the Cheddar, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the sprouts back to the skillet, stirring gently. Evenly scatter the remaining Cheddar over the sprouts.
, Bake in the preheated oven until starting to bubble and turn golden brown, checking sprouts for tenderness with the tip of a knife, 12 to 15 minutes. If mixture looks a little dry, drizzle in a little bit of half-and-half for moisture.
, Remove skillet from oven, top with bacon, and serve,
,This may be cooked in a non-ovenproof skillet, transferring the sprouts to a baking dish, and then into the oven.

ingredients_list: olive oil,red cabbage, chopped,onion, chopped,red bell pepper, chopped,yellow bell pepper, chopped,salt and ground black pepper to taste
direction_list: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over high heat; cook and stir cabbage, onion, red bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper in the hot oil, stirring every 30 seconds, until tender, 5 to 7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

ingredients_list: olive oil,shallot, chopped,carrots,garlic, minced,green cabbage, cored and chopped,vegetable broth,fresh herbs,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,parsley sprigs for garnish (optional)
direction_list:
Heat olive oil in a large skillet with a lid over medium heat. Add shallot and carrots, and cook, stirring often, until shallots begin to soften, about 3 minutes.
, Mix in garlic and cabbage and cook about 2 minutes, stirring often. Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
, Sprinkle in minced fresh herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, uncovered, about 3 minutes.
, Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook, until cabbage is as tender as you like, 8 to 10 minutes.
, Taste and adjust seasoning. Garnish with fresh parsley. Serve warm.

ingredients_list: bacon,bacon drippings,cabbage, cored and finely chopped,ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Cook bacon in a deep skillet over medium heat until crisp, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove bacon from skillet and drain on a paper towel-lined plate. Reserve 1/4 cup drippings in skillet.
, Add cabbage to hot bacon drippings; cook and stir over medium heat until cabbage wilts, 5 to 7 minutes.
, Crumble bacon over cabbage. Stir and simmer until bacon is warmed, 2 to 3 minutes. Season with black pepper.

ingredients_list: potatoes, peeled and cubed,cabbage, chopped,green onions, chopped,butter, softened,half-and-half cream,salt and black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Place potatoes, cabbage, and green onions into a large saucepan; fill with water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
, Drain vegetables and place them into a large bowl. Mash potatoes and vegetables with butter using a fork until mixture is chunky, pouring in half-and-half gradually as you mash. Season with salt and pepper.

ingredients_list: Parmesan cheese,olive oil,italian seasoning,garlic powder,kosher salt,paprika,head cabbage
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) with racks in top third and lower third positions. Line 2 large-rimmed baking sheets with parchment paper.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Stir together Parmesan cheese, oil, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and paprika in a small bowl until cheese is well coated in oil mixture.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Evenly spread Parmesan mixture on one side of each cabbage wedge (about 2 tablespoons per wedge) and arrange, paste side down, on the prepared baking sheets.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Bake in the preheated oven until cabbage is tender-crisp and Parmesan creates a golden brown crust on bottom of cabbage, 16 to 18 minutes, rotating pans between top and bottom racks and from front to back halfway through.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Remove cabbage from oven, and let stand undisturbed for 2 minutes, before using a spatula to release cabbage wedges from baking sheets. Turn cabbage wedges over, cheese side up; and bake at 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) until cabbage is tender, 6 to 8 minutes. Serve hot.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios

ingredients_list: broccoli crowns, cut into large florets (about 1 pound),shredded Parmesan cheese,garlic powder, lemon pepper
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Place broccoli florets in a microwave-safe dish. Cook on High for 4 minutes. Transfer broccoli to a cutting board. Using a small glass or shot glass, smash the florets flat.
, Spread shredded Parmesan in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Divide smashed broccoli evenly over cheese. Season broccoli with garlic powder and lemon pepper seasoning.
, Bake in the preheated oven until Parmesan layer is crisp and tips of broccoli are well browned, about 30 minutes. Break up and serve immediately.

ingredients_list: mushrooms,olive oil,garlic, minced,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,fresh mozzarella cheese, divided,cherry tomatoes, halved,basil leaves,,balsamic glaze, or as needed
direction_list:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.
, Remove mushroom stems and remove gills. Place mushrooms, cap side facing downward, on a wire rack over the prepared baking sheet.Â 
, Bake in the preheated oven until mushrooms have released their liquid, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk olive oil and minced garlic together; season with salt and pepper.
, Remove mushrooms and drain off liquid. Flip mushrooms over, and return to the baking sheet. Place one slice of fresh mozzarella into each mushroom cavity. Lightly drizzle olive oil mixture over cheese.
, Preheat the broiler, and set a rack about 6 inches from the heat source.Â 
, Broil mushrooms until cheese is golden, about 5 minutes.
, Place tomatoes in a bowl. Cut remaining mozzarella into cubes, and combine with tomatoes. Spoon tomato mixture evenly into mushroom caps; top with basil, and drizzle with balsamic glaze.

ingredients_list: white sugar,cornstarch,white vinegar,water,sliced beets, drained,butter,salt,pepper
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Combine sugar, cornstarch, vinegar, and water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Add beets to the liquid, and simmer for 30 minutes over low heat. Stir in butter, salt, and pepper, and remove from the heat. Serve warm or chilled.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios

ingredients_list: unsalted butter,minced garlic,riced cauliflower,salt,ground black pepper,nutmeg,chicken broth,chives
direction_list:
Melt butter in a large skillet, over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
, Stir in thawed, riced cauliflower, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil, stirring frequently.
, Cook, covered, about 8 minutes, then remove cover and continue cooking and stirring until most of the liquid evaporates, an additional 5 to 8 minutes.
, Use an immersion blender to purÃ©e cauliflower until smooth. If an immersion blender is not available, spoon cauliflower into a blender to purÃ©e. When smooth, place in a serving bowl and garnish with snipped chives.

ingredients_list: olive oil,onion,red cabbage,apple cider vinegar,ground mustard,sugar,salt,ground black pepper
direction_list:
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and saute 2 minutes. Add cabbage and saute 5 minutes more.
, Stir in vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Saute until cabbage is as tender as you like, about 10 minutes.

ingredients_list: green cabbage (about 2 pounds),olive oil,unsalted butter,onion,minced garlic,apple cider vinegar,salt,,ground black pepper,, lemon wedges
direction_list:
Remove any damaged outer leaves from cabbage. Cut cabbage in half down through the stem, then cut halves into quarters. Carefully cut out cores and thinly slice cabbage.
, Heat a large skillet over medium heat, and add olive oil and butter. Once melted, add onions, and saute until translucent and just lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes Add garlic, and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
, Add cabbage, mixing well with onions, and cook, stirring frequently, until tender and lightly browned, but not burned, 13 to 16 minutes. If cabbage starts to dry out a bit, add a little water to the pan.
, Drizzle vinegar over cabbage, stir well, and cook for 1 minute. Season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve hot with a wedge of fresh lemon.

ingredients_list: chopped broccoli,flour,eggs,shredded sharp Cheddar cheese,Mexican seasoning mix ,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,vegetable oil,sour cream, or to taste,casero pollo asado seasoning (such as ,, to taste
direction_list:
Place chopped broccoli in a microwave-safe bowl. Pour 3 tablespoons water over the top and cover with a plate. Microwave on high for 2 minutes.
, Add softened broccoli, flour, and egg to a food processor. Pulse until well combined. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Mix in cheese, Mexican seasoning, salt, and pepper until well incorporated.
, Heat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high.
, Use a scoop to portion out about 2 tablespoons of mixture. Drop broccoli mixture into hot oil and flatten out with a spatula. Cook broccoli fritters until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
, Transfer cooked fritters onto a cooling rack set over a baking tray. Serve with sour cream and seasoning.

ingredients_list: cauliflower, cut into small florets,olive oil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,sweet chili sauce,soy sauce,chile garlic sauce,green onion, sliced,toasted sesame seeds for garnish (optional)
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C), and set a rack in the upper third of the oven. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Place cauliflower florets in a large bowl. Top with olive oil, salt, and pepper; toss to coat. Arrange cauliflower on the prepared baking sheet in a single even layer.
, Bake in the preheated oven on the upper rack until tender, about 30 minutes.
, Meanwhile, bring sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, and Sriracha to a boil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
, Remove the baking sheet from the oven. Drizzle sauce on top and gently stir to coat.
, Divide cauliflower between serving plates and top with green onion slices. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds.

ingredients_list: mayonnaise,milk,sugar,white vinegar,cucumber, sliced,salt and pepper to taste
direction_list: Mix mayonnaise, milk, sugar, and vinegar together in a bowl until smooth. Add cucumber and toss until well coated. Season with salt and pepper. Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.

recipe_name: Charred Cabbage, Ginger, and Sesame Slaw
ingredients_list: red cabbage (about 2 pounds),lime, halved,green onions,fresh ginger, unpeeled,carrots, peeled and coarsely shredded,vegetable oil,rice vinegar,honey or agave syrup,riracha,toasted sesame oil,clove garlic, minced,crushed red pepper,salt,sesame seeds, toasted,chopped, unsalted roasted peanuts, for garnish
direction_list:
Preheat an outdoor grill to medium heat (350 degrees F to 375 degrees F/175 degrees C to 190 degrees C) . Remove any wilted outer leaves from cabbage, then cut the head into quarters.
, Lightly oil grill grates. Arrange cabbage and lime, cut sides down, along with green onions and ginger, on grill grates and cover. Grill green onions and lime, turning halfway through, until charred, 2 to 4 minutes for onions and 6 to 8 minutes for lime. Grill cabbage and ginger, turning halfway through, until cabbage is charred and ginger is softened, 12 to 16 minutes.
, When cool enough to handle, core and shred cabbage. Chop green onions, discarding any completely charred parts. Toss together carrots, cabbage, and green onions in a large bowl.
, ,Peel and grate 1 tablespoon ginger (save any remaining ginger for another use).
, In a small bowl, whisk together ginger, juice from grilled lime, vegetable oil, vinegar, honey, sriracha, sesame oil, garlic, crushed red pepper, and salt. Add to cabbage mixture and toss to combine. Cover and chill 1 hour before serving, or up to 1 week.
, Just before serving, add sesame seeds; toss to combine. Garnish with peanuts.

recipe_name: Spiced Roasted Okra with Mini Peppers
ingredients_list: okra pods,mini sweet peppers, halved,olive oil,garam masala,ground coriander,ground cumin,ground turmeric,garlic powder,salt,cayenne pepper,ground black pepper
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil. Arrange okra and sweet peppers in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with oil; toss to coat.Â 
, Roast in the preheated oven until browned, about 20 minutes. Stir together garam masala, coriander, cumin, turmeric, garlic powder, salt, cayenne pepper, and black pepper. Sprinkle over veggies; toss to coat.

recipe_name: Sugar Snap Peas with Peanut Dipping Sauce
ingredients_list: peanut butter,lime juice,tamari or soy sauce,fresh ginger,olive oil,sugar snap peas, trimmed,salt,lime wedges,peanuts, for serving
direction_list:
Whisk together powdered peanut butter, lime juice, tamari, and ginger in a small bowl. Add water, 1 tablespoon at a time, to reach a dipping consistency.
, Heat oil in a very large skillet over high heat. Add peas and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until peas are blistered with some charred spots, about 5 minutes. Serve with lime wedges and peanut sauce. Garnish sauce with chopped peanuts.

ingredients_list: eggs,Yukon gold potatoes,dill pickle brine, divided,salt,grated Parmesan cheese,mayonnaise,sour cream,Dijon mustard,bacon,chives,dill pickles,celery, chopped,crispy fried onions
direction_list:
Gather your ingredients.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Place eggs into a small pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then remove from the heat and cover with a lid. Let sit for 10 minutes.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Drain eggs and place into an ice bath to cool completely.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Peel eggs and cut into quarters, or smaller if you prefer.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Peel potatoes and cut into roughly 2-inch chunks.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Add potatoes to a large pot of cold water, season the water generously with salt, and add 1/4 cup pickle juice (this helps them to hold together once cooked - you can alternatively use 2 tablespoons white vinegar). Bring to a boil over a high heat, reduce the heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain potatoes and set aside.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Meanwhile, make dressing: Stir Parmesan, mayonnaise, sour cream, mustard, and remaining 1/4 cup dill pickle brine together in a bowl.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Pour the dressing over the hot potatoes and stir to coat. Taste and season with salt, if needed, then leave to cool.,
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, Place bacon into a large skillet and fry over medium heat, turning over to let both sides crisp up, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove to a chopping board and cut into bite-sized pieces.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, To the cooled potatoes, add the boiled eggs, celery, chopped dill pickle, most of the bacon and most of the chives. Mix together to combine.Â ,
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack, When ready to serve, transfer the potato salad to a serving dish and garnish with remaining chives and bacon, as well as the crispy fried onions.
,Allrecipes/Izy Hossack

ingredients_list: oil for frying,sweet corn,,cornstarch,salt,paprika,ground black pepper,lime wedges
direction_list:
Heat oil in a medium saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Pour drained corn on a large plate lined with paper towels and pat dry,Â 
, Toss corn with cornstarch until lightly coated. Work in batches, about 1/2 cup at a time. Shake off excess cornstarch and carefully lower corn into hot oil, using a slotted spoon. Fry until lightly golden brown and crispy, 2 to 3 minutes; drain on paper towels. Repeat with remaining corn.Â 
, Season with paprika and pepper; squeeze lime juice over and sprinkle with jalapenos if desired.
,Nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of cornstarch. The actual amount consumed will vary. We have determined the nutritional value of oil for frying based on a retention value of 10% after cooking. The exact amount will vary depending on cooking time and temperature, ingredient density, and specific type of oil used.

recipe_name: Sweet and Spicy Sweet Potato Bites
ingredients_list: onion powder,garlic granules,paprika,sugar,coriander,salt,dried oregano,dried parsley,sweet potatoes,,olive oil
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (225 degrees C). Stir onion powder, garlic granules, paprika, sugar, coriander, salt, oregano, and parsley together in a small bowl; set seasoning aside.
, Add sweet potatoes to a large bowl or resealable plastic bag. Add the oil; sprinkle in about 1 tablespoon seasoning. Toss to coat potatoes. Extra seasoning can be stored in an airtight jar.
, Bake in the preheated oven until tender, about 25 minutes.

ingredients_list: beets,olive oil,salt,honey
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Cut stems and leaves from beets and wash well. With skin on, cut beets into chunks. Toss beets in olive oil and sprinkle with salt. Spread beets in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet.
, Roast in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
, Remove from the oven and drizzle with honey. Using a wooden spoon, stir beets to coat completely with honey, then spread them back out on the pan.
, Continue roasting until tender, about 15 minutes. Allow to cool.

ingredients_list: water,Vidalia onion,zucchini,yellow squash,fresh oregano,salt, divided,olive oil,flour,black pepper,whole milk,shredded Gruyere cheese
direction_list:
Set oven rack 6 inches from heat source; preheat broiler. Bring water to a boil in a large skillet; add onion, zucchini, and yellow squash. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, until tender, 7 to 9 minutes. Drain. Transfer to a 1-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with oregano and 1/4 teaspoon salt.Â 
, In a small saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Whisk in flour, pepper, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt; cook until foaming, then whisk in milk until thickened, about 2 minutes. Stir in GruyÃ¨re cheese until melted; pour over vegetable mixture.
, Broil until browned, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle with more oregano and pepper.

ingredients_list: green beans,black pepper,grated Parmesan cheese,crushed red pepper,minced garlic
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Arrange green beans on a parchment paper-lined rimmed baking sheet. Lightly coat with cooking spray. Sprinkle with black pepper; toss to coat.
, Roast in the preheated oven until softened, 15 to 20 minutes.Â 
, Add Parmesan, garlic, and crushed red pepper; toss to coat. Roast until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle with additional cheese and crushed red pepper.

recipe_name: Mushroom Pilaf with Pine Nuts and Dried Cherries
ingredients_list: olive oil,cremini mushrooms,white rice,low-sodium vegetable stock,pine nuts,dried cherries,salt,black pepper,fresh basil,
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
, Heat 2 teaspoons oil over medium heat in a large oven-safe skillet. Add mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 8 minutes. Add remaining 1 teaspoon olive oil and the rice; cook, stirring occasionally, until rice is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in stock, pine nuts, cherries, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.Â 
, Bake, covered, in the preheated oven until liquid is absorbed, about 17 minutes. Let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Sprinkle with fresh basil.

ingredients_list: cauliflower,olive oil,granulated garlic,smoked paprika,cayenne pepper,salt,white pepper,mayonnaise,chili sauce,soy sauce,sesame oil,sriracha,onion powder,sesame seeds,chives
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) and line a 12x18-inch sheet pan with aluminum foil.
, Toss cauliflower pieces with olive oil in a large bowl. Place cauliflower in a single layer on the prepared pan.
, Whisk granulated garlic, smoked paprika, cayenne, salt, and white pepper together in a small bowl. Sprinkle mixture evenly over cauliflower pieces.
, Bake in the center of the preheated oven until just barely tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
, Make the sauce: stir mayonnaise, chili sauce, soy sauce, sesame oil, sriracha, and onion powder together in a small bowl. Drizzle about half of the sauce over the cauliflower pieces. Reserve remaining sauce for serving.
, Stir the cauliflower and continue baking another 10 minutes, or until the cauliflower reaches the desired doneness.
, Garnish with sesame seeds and fresh snipped chives. Serve with reserved sauce.

ingredients_list: cauliflower,harissa paste in oil,salt
direction_list:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees F). Line a baking sheet with parchment.
, Remove the greenery from cauliflower. Using your hands, gently but firmly pull cauliflower apart until you have several small clusters.
, Place cauliflower on the prepared pan. Drizzle harissa paste onto cauliflower and toss well. Add a pinch of salt and toss again.
, Roast in the preheated oven until tender, 30 to 40 minutes.

recipe_name: Rajas con Crema (Roasted Poblano Peppers in Cream Sauce)
ingredients_list: poblano peppers,butter,onion,garlic,Mexican crema,salt,chicken bouillon granules,ground black pepper,Oaxaca cheese
direction_list:
Place poblano chiles directly on the grates of a gas stove. Cook over medium heat, flipping with tongs occasionally, until blackened and charred, about 5 minutes. Place in a sealed plastic bag and allow to cool, 5 to 6 minutes. Peel off charred skins, remove seeds, and slice chiles into strips. Set aside.
,If you want to char the poblanos in an air fryer, preheat the air fryer to 450 degrees C(230 degrees C). Add poblanos to air fryer basket and cook for 8 to 10 minutes. Continue cooking and flipping the poblanos until the skin is blackened and blistered, 5 to 6 minutes., Melt butter in a large skillet. Add onions and cook until soft and translucent, 6 to 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add poblano peppers, Mexican crema, salt, chicken bouillon, and pepper; cook and stir until combined. Turn off heat, add cheese, and stir until melted.
,Mozzarella cheese can be substituted for the Oaxaca cheese.

ingredients_list: parsley,,cilantro, ,serrano peppers,garlic,extra-virgin olive oil,lemon juice,ground cumin,cauliflower,olive oil,salt,ground black pepper
direction_list:
Combine parsley, cilantro, serrano peppers, garlic, 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, lemon juice, and cumin in a blender. Pulse until smooth. Set aside.
, Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a large baking sheet with foil.
, Place cauliflower florets in a large bowl. Add 1 tablespoon olive olive oil, salt, and pepper. Toss to combine. Spread seasoned cauliflower on the baking sheet in a single layer.
, Roast in the preheated oven until tender with a bite, about 30 minutes.
, Divide cauliflower between plates and serve with zhug sauce for dipping.

ingredients_list: bacon,butter,corn muffin mix (such as Jiffy,corn, drained,creamed corn,green onions,egg,sour cream,shredded Monterey Jack cheese,Cajun seasoning
direction_list:
Â Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9X13-inch baking dish.
, Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat, turning occasionally, until crisp, about 7 minutes. Crumble when cool enough to handle and set aside. Reserve 2 tablespoons bacon grease.Â 
, Add reserved bacon grease to a large bowl; add butter, corn muffin mix, corn, creamed corn, green onions, egg, sour cream, shredded cheese, and Cajun seasoning and stir to combine. Pour into the prepared baking dish.Â 
, Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and springs back when lightly touched near the center, about 45 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

ingredients_list: thick-cut bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces,cabbage, cored and sliced,onion, sliced,caraway seeds,salt,black pepper
direction_list: Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until fat starts to render, about 5 minutes. Stir in cabbage, onion, caraway seeds, salt, and pepper. Cook, covered, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 15 minutes.

ingredients_list: parsley,olive oil,red wine vinegar,garlic, minced,red pepper flakes,dried oregano,salt to taste,cauliflower,olive oil,garlic salt
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Combine parsley, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, oregano, and salt in a bowl. Set aside.
, Remove the tough bottom leaves from each cauliflower, taking care not to remove the stem. Place the cauliflower heads onto a cutting board with the stem side facing upwards; cut vertically on both sides of the stem to remove the loose florets. Cut each cauliflower vertically through the stem into 2 even "steaks", 1 to 1 1/2 inches thick; remove any remaining small leaves from each steak. Reserve remaining cauliflower for another use.
, Place cauliflower steaks on the baking sheet. Brush both sides with olive oil and sprinkle with garlic salt.
, Roast in the preheated oven until the edges are golden brown and the cauliflower is tender, 25 to 30 minutes, flipping halfway through. Place cauliflower on a serving platter and spoon chimichurri sauce over top.

ingredients_list: ground beef,low-sodium chicken broth,tomato sauce,fire roasted diced tomatoes,garlic,green bell pepper,red bell pepper,onion,chicken bouillon,dried oregano,salt,pepper, instant white rice,shredded mozzarella cheese
direction_list:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard any excess grease.
, Place beef, chicken broth, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, garlic, green pepper, red pepper, onion, bouillon, oregano, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to combine and cook on High until vegetables are soft, 3 to 4 hours.
, Add rice and cook until rice is tender, 20 to 25 minutes more. Serve topped with mozzarella cheese.

ingredients_list: chicken apple sausage,unsalted butter,onion,,garlic,dried thyme,salt and freshly ground black pepper,all-purpose flour,low-sodium chicken broth,half-and-half,fresh green beans,potatoes,carrots,fried onions
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 3-quart baking dish.
, Brown sausage pieces in a nonstick skillet over medium heat, 3 to 5 minutes; remove from the pan to a large bowl.
, In the same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions, and cook, stirring, until soft, about 3 minutes. Stir in garlic and cook another 30 seconds. Stir in thyme; season with salt and pepper.
, Sprinkle flour over onions and garlic, and stir until flour has been absorbed, about 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in chicken broth and half-and-half. Bring to a boil, while stirring, then reduce to a simmer and cook, stirring, until sauce thickens and coats the back of a spoon, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove skillet from the heat.
, Add green beans, potatoes, and carrots to the bowl with sausage; add sauce and stir to coat all ingredients with the sauce. Transfer mixture to the prepared baking dish. Cover with foil.
, Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Remove foil, stir, and sprinkle fried onions on top.
, Continue to bake until casserole is hot and bubbly and onions have crisped slightly, about 20 minutes more. Serve warm.

ingredients_list: mayonnaise,apple cider vinegar,sugar,onion powder,black pepper,salt to taste,broccoli florets,broccoli slaw mix,sunflower seeds,dried cranberries,red onion,bacon
direction_list:
Combine mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, sugar, onion powder, pepper, and salt in a bowl. Whisk together until smooth and creamy. Set aside.
, In a large bowl combine broccoli slaw, broccoli florets, red onion, sunflower seeds, dried cranberries, and bacon. Pour dressing mix on top of broccoli mix and toss until well coated.
, Chill until ready to serve.
,Need tips for cooking a small amount of bacon? Here's a quick way to ,.

ingredients_list: bacon,butter,flour,evaporated milk,olive oil,onion,ground beef,diced tomatoes with green chilies,ranch style beans,corn,beef broth,potatoes,granulated garlic,ground cumin,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 8 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels; chop when cool enough to handle.
, Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; whisk in flour. Slowly add evaporated milk, whisking until smooth. Cook until thickened slightly, about 2 minutes; remove from heat.
, Add oil to a large pot or Dutch oven; cook onions over medium heat until nearly translucent. Add ground beef, and cook and stir, breaking up chunks with a spatula as it cooks, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain any excess fat.
, Add bacon, diced tomatoes with green chiles, beans, and corn. Pour in beef broth and add the diced potatoes. Stir to combine. Add garlic granules, and cumin. Season with salt and pepper.
, Bring soup to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Cover; simmer until potatoes are tender;Â  20 to 30 minutes. Pour evaporated milk mixture into soup; stir to combine. Serve immediately.

ingredients_list: mashed potatoes,omano cheese,eggs, lightly beaten,sliced pancetta,,fresh parsley,garlic, minced,onion powder,salt,crushed red pepper,bread crumbs,vegetable oil,ijon mustard,maple syrup,lemon juice,chopped fresh herbs,cider vinegar,black pepper
direction_list:
Combine potatoes, cheese, eggs, pancetta, 2 tablespoons parsley, garlic, onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon. salt, and red pepper in a large bowl. Using damp hands, form mixture into 18 patties. Coat patties in bread crumbs.
, Pour oil to a depth of 1/2 inch into a large, heavy-bottomed skillet. (Youâll need about 3 cups oil.) Heat over medium-high heat to 350 degrees F to 365 degrees F (175 to 185 degrees C). Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (93 degrees C).,
, Working in batches, fry potato patties in hot oil, turning halfway through, until browned on both sides, 2 to 4 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined baking sheet and keep warm in the oven.Â ,
, For sauce, whisk together mustard, maple syrup, lemon juice, chopped herbs, vinegar, black pepper, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt in a small bowl. Garnish with additional herbs. Serve croquettes with sauce.
,We have determined the nutritional value of oil for frying based on a retention value of 10% after cooking. Amount will vary depending on cooking time and temperature, ingredient density, and specific type of oil used.

ingredients_list: broccoli, cut into florets,vegetable oil,salt,black pepper,Asian-style chili paste,garlic, minced,maple syrup,toasted sesame oil,toasted sesame seeds
direction_list:
Set oven rack about 6 inches from heat source and preheat broiler. Put a steamer basket in a large saucepan. Add water to just below steamer basket. Bring to a boil. Add broccoli to steamer basket; reduce heat to medium-low. Steam, covered, until crisp-tender, 4 minutes.Â 
, When cool enough to handle, spread broccoli on a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet. Using the bottom of a sturdy glass, flatten broccoli florets to 1/2 inch thick. Drizzle with vegetable oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper; toss to coat.
, Broil until charred around edges, 5 to 7 minutes.
, Meanwhile, stir together chili paste, garlic, maple syrup, and sesame oil in a small bowl. Spoon over broccoli. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.

recipe_name: Smoked Mackerel, Beets, Apples, and Bread Crisps
ingredients_list: pumpernickel bread, torn into bite- sized pieces,olive oil,black pepper, plus more for garnish,yogurt,lemon juice,cider vinegar,oil-packed smoked mackerel, ,beets (such as Melissa's), drained and chopped,apple, cored and diced,fresh dill, for garnish,lemon zest and lemon wedges,
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
, Toss bread with oil and 1/4 teaspoon pepper on a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet. Spread into an even layer. Bake, stirring halfway through, until crisp, about 12 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes.,
, Meanwhile, for sauce, whisk together yogurt, lemon juice, vinegar, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a small bowl. Serve bread, smoked mackerel, beets, and apple with sauce. Garnish with dill and additional black pepper. Serve with lemon zest and wedges.
,If earthy beets arenât your thing, replace them with vitamin A-packed carrots: Toss 8 oz. carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces, with 1 tablespoon olive oil and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper on a separate 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet. Roast alongside bread in Step 1, adding an additional 15 minutes.,Swap out the canned smoked mackerel for 2 (4-oz.) fresh skinless salmon fillets. Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook salmon, turning halfway through, until it flakes easily with a fork, 4 to 6 minutes per 1/2-inch thickness. Flake into bite-size pieces.,Use pumpernickel, rye, or another whole-grain bread with at least 2 grams of fiber per serving.

ingredients_list: olive oil,yellow onion, diced,red bell peppers, diced,chorizo,dried red chili pepper,tomatoes,tomato paste,white wine,garlic cloves,,saffron,smoked paprika,rice (short grain or paella rice),chicken stock,jumbo shrimp,mussels,clams
direction_list:
Place a medium-sized paella pan over medium-high heat, and add oil, onion, bell pepper, chorizo, and dried chili and cook until vegetables soften, about 3 minutes.
, Using a box grater, grate tomatoes straight into the pan. Stir and cook until liquid has reduced by half.
, Reduce heat to low, and add tomato paste, white wine, garlic, saffron, and paprika. Cook paste mixture down, stirring, until fully incorporated.Â 
, Add rice and chicken stock and stir until everything is all mixed in. Simmer over low heat, without stirring, for 15 minutes. Every now and then, peek with a spoon to make sure nothing is sticking or burning while simmering.Â 
, After 15 minutes add shrimp, mussels, and clams. Cover with a lid or foil and cook on low for another 5 minutes. Turn off heat and let the pan sit for 5 minutes.
, Remove the lid. The rice should be fluffy with a slightly toasted bottom, mussels and clams should be open all of the way, and your shrimp should be pink. Fluff paella with a fork before serving.

ingredients_list: canola oil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,chicken thighs,tomatoes,chicken stock, or as needed,ribs celery,,yellow onion, diced, bell pepper,cayenne pepper,bay leaves,garlic cloves,tasso or ham steak,andouille sausage,long grain rice,scallions
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
, Add canola oil to a large Dutch oven set over medium heat. Salt and pepper chicken liberally and sear on both sides until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side. Remove from Dutch oven.Â 
, Open canned tomatoes and strain liquid into a 4-cup measuring cup. Pour in enough chicken stock to total 4 cups; set aside. Roughly chop tomatoes.
, Add celery, onion, bell pepper (the trinity), chopped tomatoes, cayenne, bay leaves, and garlic to the Dutch oven and stir until combined on medium heat. Mix in stock with tomato juice, seared chicken, tasso, andouille, and rice. Bring this to a nice simmer. Cover the pot.
, Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. Remove the pot from the oven and continue to let jambalaya steam for an additional 5 minutes.Â 
, Garnish with scallions and a few dashes of hot sauce when ready to serve.

ingredients_list: beets,burrata cheese,fresh basil leaves, torn,balsamic glaze, or as needed
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
, Peel beets and place them whole or cut into pieces on the parchment.
, Roast beets in the preheated oven until tender when pierced with a knife, 30 to 40 minutes. Allow to cool to room temperature, about 15 minutes. Peel and slice.
, Place burrata in a shallow dish and slice open to allow the cheese to ooze out. Arrange beet slices around the burrata. Top with chopped basil and drizzle with balsamic glaze.

ingredients_list: smoked ham hocks,collard greens - cl,1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Place smoked ham hocks in a large pot and add 4 cups of water. Cover and simmer over low heat until meat nearly pulls away from the bone, and the skin is a little tender, about 1 hour.Â 
, Remove ham hocks from the pot. Add collards and red pepper flakes, and season with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer until tender, about 1 hour. Add ham hocks back in and cook for another 15 minutes.

ingredients_list: mayonnaise,ketchup,pickle relish,Worcestershire sauce,garlic powder,cayenne pepper,canola oil,flour,yellow cornmeal,granulated sugar,baking powder,kosher salt,garlic powder,cayenne pepper,sweet onion,whole buttermilk
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Prepare the Dipping Sauce: Whisk together mayonnaise, ketchup, relish, Worcestershire, garlic powder, and cayenne in a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Prepare the Onion Patties: Pour oil to a depth of 1/2 inch in a large cast-iron skillet; heat over medium-high. While oil heats, whisk together flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, and cayenne in a bowl.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Add onion and buttermilk and stir until combined.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, A drop of batter should sizzle as it hits the oil, indicating itâs ready. Working in batches, spoon a scant 1/4 cup of batter into the hot oil, and using a spoon, spread slightly into circles. Fry until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes total. Remove from pan to a wire rack set over paper towels and immediately sprinkle with salt to taste.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Serve hot with Dipping Sauce.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios

recipe_name: This Easy TikTok Pizza Is the 3-Ingredient Recipe of Our Dreams
ingredients_list: pizza dough,Roma tomatoes,fresh basil,olive oil,salt,black pepper,dried oregano
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) with a rack in the center position. Lightly oil a 13- by 18-inch rimmed baking sheet.
,AllRecipes/Qi Ai, Thinly slice tomatoes and place them on a paper towel-lined plate. Pat the tops of the tomatoes dry.
,AllRecipes/Qi Ai, Gently stretch and press pizza dough to each corner of the rimmed baking sheet. Drizzle with oil, then season all over with salt, pepper, and oregano (or Italian seasoning).
,AllRecipes/Qi Ai, Cover the pizza dough with sliced tomatoes (they should touch). Bake pizza until the crust is golden brown and the tomatoes look roasted, 22 to 25 minutes.
,AllRecipes/Qi Ai, Let cool slightly, then transfer to a cutting board and cut into small squares. Sprinkle with a pinch of salt and garnish with fresh basil.
,AllRecipes/Qi Ai

ingredients_list: sweet potatoes,olive oil,kosher salt,bacon,butter,chipotle peppers in adobo,maple syrup,green onion,sour cream,pepper Jack cheese,
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with foil or parchment.Â Rub potatoes evenly with oil and sprinkle evenly with 1 1/2 teaspoons salt. Pierce potatoes with a fork and place them on the prepared sheet.Â 
, Bake in the preheated oven until completely tender, 35 to 40 minutes.
, Meanwhile, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until crisp, about 10 minutes. Reserve 1 tablespoon bacon grease. Drain bacon on paper towels, chop, and set aside.Â 
, Cut the top 1/4 off the top of each potato and scoop out most of the potato, reserving intact skins with flesh about 1/8-inch-thick.Â 
, Add scooped flesh to a bowl with butter, reserved bacon grease, and remaining salt, and mash until creamy and only small lumps remain. Stir in chipotles and adobo sauce, maple syrup, green onions, sour cream, and 1 cup cheese. Divide filling evenly among potatoes and top each with 1 tablespoon cheese. Return potatoes to the lined baking sheet.
, Return to the oven and bake until hot and cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.

ingredients_list: all-purpose flour,kosher salt,ground black pepper,paprika,garlic powder,round or rump steak,vegetable oil,onion,green bell pepper,carrots,sliced mushrooms,stewed tomatoes,fresh parsley
direction_list:
Stir flour, kosher salt, black pepper, paprika, and garlic powder together in a small bowl. Pound steak with a meat mallet. Sprinkle meat with flour mixture on both sides and use the meat mallet to pound the mixture into the meat.
, Heat oil in a large deep skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat until slightly shimmering.Â  Add meat and cook, undisturbed, until browned and releases easily from the pan, about 3 minutes. Flip steak and cook for 2 more minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.Â 
, Add onion, bell pepper, carrots and mushrooms to the drippings in pan; cook and stir until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Stir in stewed tomatoes. Return steak to pan, along with any accumulated juices and bring to a simmer.Â Â 
, Cover, reduce heat and simmer until steak is tender, about 1 1/2 hours. Sprinkle with parsley and serve steak and tomato mixture over rice.
,Here's everything you need to know about

ingredients_list: hamburger buns,butter,sliced mushrooms,onions,salt and freshly ground black pepper,ground beef,onion soup mix,havarti cheese,mayonnaise
direction_list:
Preheat a large skillet over medium heat. Place hamburger bun halves, cut-sides down, in the hot skillet until lightly toasted, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove toasted buns to a plate.
, Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat. Heat butter in a large saucepan over medium heat on the grill. Add mushrooms and onions; season with salt and black pepper and cook and stir until mushrooms are lightly browned, about 20 minutes.
, Meanwhile, mix ground beef and onion soup mix in a bowl using your hands. Form mixture into 6 hamburger patties.
, Lightly oil grill grates. Grill burgers for about 5 minutes, then flip and grill to your desired doneness. A meat thermometer inserted near the center of patties should read 180 degrees F (82 degrees C).
, Remove burgers from heat to rest for 5 minutes. Spread each bun with 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, and add burgers; divide mushrooms and onions between burgers to serve.

ingredients_list: mini peppers,,whipped cream cheese,shredded Cheddar cheese,everything bagel seasoning,green onion, chopped
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place peppers on a large baking sheet.
, Combine cream cheese, Cheddar, everything seasoning, and green onion in a bowl. Mix well until evenly combined. Using a butter knife, spread each pepper with an equal amount of cheese mixture.
, Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Turn the ovenâs broiler to High and broil until cheese is browned on top, about 2 minutes.

ingredients_list: cauliflower,olive oil,salt and freshly ground pepper to taste,pesto,grated Parmesan cheese
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
, In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper until evenly coated. Spread cauliflower evenly in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Set the bowl aside.Â 
, Roast in the preheated oven until golden and crispy on the edges, 25 to 30 minutes, turning halfway through cooking time.
, Transfer hot cauliflower back to the bowl and toss with pesto and Parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.

ingredients_list: water,quinoa,English cucumber,red pepper,,black olives,,red onion,feta crumbles,olive oil,red wine vinegar,garlic clove,,Dijon mustard,fresh parsley,fresh oregano
direction_list:
Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain, and cool to room temperature, about 20 minutes.
, Combine quinoa, cucumber, red peppers, olives, and red onion in a large bowl; sprinkle with feta cheese.
, Whisk olive oil, vinegar, garlic, mustard, parsley, and oregano together in a small bowl. Pour dressing over salad, toss well to combine, and serve.

ingredients_list: baby spinach,skinless, boneless chicken breasts ,kosher salt,ground black pepper,cayenne pepper,all-purpose flour,olive oil,butter,cloves garlic,shallots or onions,white wine,lemon zest,red bell peppers,heavy cream
direction_list:
Wilt spinach in a large pot over medium-high heat. As soon as the spinach turns green, quickly transfer to a strainer and squeeze out most of the water. Transfer to a cutting board and roughly chop. Reserve until needed.
, Season chicken on both sides with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper, and coat evenly all over with the flour.Â 
, Add 2 tablespoons olive oil to a nonstick pan, and heat over medium-high heat. Place chicken in, and once breasts are sizzling in the oil, reduce heat to medium. Cook breasts until just cooked through and a golden brown crust has formed, 4 to 5 minutes per side. Turn off heat and reserve.
, Add remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and butter to the pan you plan to serve chicken in (see Chefâs Note). Turn heat to medium-high, and once butter melts, add garlic, shallots, and a pinch of salt. Cook, stirring, for about 1 minute. Add wine, and cook, stirring, until the wine reduces by half, a few minutes more.
, Add lemon zest and red peppers, and cook, stirring for another few minutes. Stir in cream, and bring mixture up to a simmer. Season to taste with salt, black pepper, and cayenne.
, Once cream simmers for a few minutes, and begins to reduce and thicken slightly, reduce heat to medium and stir in wilted spinach until evenly combined with cream sauce.
, Place chicken back into the pan, and simmer on medium, until chicken is heated through, 3 to 4 minutes.
, Serve with a drizzle of olive oil and another light grating of lemon zest.
,John Mitzewich,A nonstick pan is better for searing skinless chicken breasts, and can be used for the whole dish, as long as chicken is removed to a plate before proceeding with the sauce. I made the sauce in a separate pan, because I wanted a nicer looking pan for service.

ingredients_list: plum tomatoes,sweet onion,garlic cloves,olive oil,kosher salt,black pepper,crushed red pepper,heavy whipping cream,basil leaves,light brown sugar
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss tomatoes with onion, garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and crushed red pepper, if using, until vegetables are evenly coated.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Roast in a preheated oven until juices are released and vegetables are very soft and charred in spots, 35 to 40 minutes.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Transfer roasted vegetable mixture to a blender along with cream, basil, and brown sugar. Secure lid on blender, and remove center piece to allow steam to escape. Place a clean towel over the opening. Process until smooth, about 1 minute. Season with salt to taste.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios, Pour soup into bowls and garnish with a drizzle of olive oil, cracked black pepper, and thinly sliced basil leaves.
,Dotdash Meredith Food Studios

recipe_name: Southwestern Sweet Potato and Black Bean Pasta Salad
ingredients_list: pasta, such as penne or bow-tie,chipotles,garlic,dried oregano,ground cumin,honey,red wine vinegar,olive oil,sweet potatoes,olive oil,kosher salt,ground black pepper,can black beans, drained and rinsed,red onion,chopped cilantro,cotija cheese
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).Â 
, Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain and set aside to cool.
, For vinaigrette, place 2 chipotle peppers, plus 1 tablespoon sauce into a blender. Add garlic, oregano, honey, and red wine vinegar, and blend on high until well combined. Drizzle in the 2/3 cup olive oil with blender running until smooth, and set aside. Chop remaining peppers finely and stir into vinaigrette. Refrigerate until ready to use.Â 
, Toss potatoes in 2 tablespoons olive oil, black pepper, and remaining salt. Coat a baking sheet with nonstick spray or line with parchment, and spread potatoes in an even layer on the sheet.Â 
, Roast in the preheated oven until browned, about 20 minutes, stirring halfway through. Remove from oven and set aside.Â 
, In a large bowl combine cooked pasta with black beans, onion, cilantro, and toss.Â  Add in potatoes and 3/4 cup vinaigrette, or more as needed, and toss gently (reserve any remaining vinaigrette for another use). Season with salt and pepper, and stir in cotija cheese. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

ingredients_list: red wine vinegar,brown sugar,Dijon mustard,shallot, finely minced,kosher salt,garlic powder,ground black pepper,crushed red pepper,dried oregano,olive oil,button mushrooms,carrots,cauliflower,marinated artichoke hearts,bowtie pasta,kale,sun-dried tomatoes in olive oil,mozzarella cheese,chopped fresh parsley
direction_list:
Whisk vinegar, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, shallot, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, red pepper, and oregano together in a large bowl. Drizzle in olive oil and whisk until well combined. Add mushrooms, carrots, cauliflower, and artichoke hearts to the dressing and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour and preferably overnight.Â 
, For salad, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain and set aside to cool.
, Massage kale to soften it slightly and add it to the marinated vegetables. Add in sun-dried tomatoes, smoked mozzarella, and parsley, and toss to coat. Taste; season with salt and pepper.

ingredients_list: ribeye steaks,kosher salt, divided,freshly ground black, pepper, divided,extra virgin olive oil, divied,onion,garlic, minced,crushed red pepper,white or red wine,roma tomatoes, chopped,oregano,tomato paste,olives,chopped parsley
direction_list:
Season steaks with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.Â  Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large deep skillet over high heat. Add steaks to skillet and cook, undisturbed, until browned about 2 minutes.Â  Flip and cook 1 more minute. Remove steaks from skillet and set aside.Â 
, Add remaining oil to skillet and turn heat to medium.Â  Add onions, remaining salt and pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally until softened.Â  Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.Â Add wine and scrape bottom of skillet to loosen any browned bits.Â Add tomatoesÂ  and oregano and bring mixture to a simmer.Â  Simmer until tomatoes soften, about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.Â Â 
, Use a potato masher or the back of a spoon to crush the tomatoes.Â  Add in tomato paste and olives and stir to combine.Â  Simmer for 2 minutes.Â Â 
, Return steaks and any juices accumulated to the skillet and cover the steaks in the tomato mixture.Â  Cook until the steak is heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.Â  Remove from heat and add parsley. Serve with crusty bread or over pasta or rice.
,Dotdash Meredith Video Studios

ingredients_list: unsalted butter,cooked pork chops,onion,sauerkraut,apple,beef broth,bacon grease,clove garlic, minced,juniper berries,bay leaf
direction_list:
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Quickly sear meat for 2 minutes on each side, and remove from pan. Reduce heat to medium, add onions, and saute for 3 minutes.
, Stir in sauerkraut, apple, beef broth, bacon grease, garlic, juniper berries, and bay leaf. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
, Remove bay leaf, add chops back to skillet, and nestle in the kraut. Simmer just until chops are warmed up, 3 to 5 minutes. Cooking further will dry them out.

recipe_name: Apple Pecan and Bacon Salad with Maple Vinaigrette
ingredients_list: apple cider vinegar,maple syrup,olive oil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,apple pie spice,bacon,red delicious apple,ranny Smith apple,red onion,mixed spring salad greens,pecans,havarti cheese
direction_list:
For vinaigrette, add vinegar, maple syrup, olive oil, salt, pepper, and apple pie seasoning to a glass jar with a tight-fitting lid; cover and shake to combine.
, Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels.
, Combine mixed greens with red delicious apple, Granny Smith apple, and onion in a large bowl. Top with pecans and havarti cheese. Drizzle with vinaigrette and serve immediately.
,Hereâs all you need to know about ,.

ingredients_list: hot Italian sausage,mushrooms,red pepper flakes,green onions,herb flavored Gournay cheese (Such as Boursin, Garlic and Fine Herbs),mini bell peppers,fresh parsley sprigs or fresh basil for garnish
direction_list:
Crumble sausage into a nonstick skillet over medium heat; cook and stir for 2 to 3 minutes.
, Add mushrooms, red pepper flakes, and green onions, reserving about 3 tablespoons of green onion tops. Stir until sausage is browned, 3 to 4 more minutes. Drain any excess fat.
, Remove skillet from heat and stir in Boursin until melted and well blended with the other ingredients.
, Fill each pepper half with about 1 1/2 tablespoons sausage mixture; place filled peppers on a baking sheet.
, Preheat the ovenâs broiler.
, Broil until filling is lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Place on a serving tray and sprinkle with reserved green onion tops.Â Garnish with sprigs of fresh parsley or fresh basil. Serve warm or at room temperature.

ingredients_list: olive oil,unsalted butter,onions,garlic, minced,sun-dried tomatoes,soy sauce,chili onion crunch ,salt and freshly ground black pepper,spaghetti,fresh parsley,2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese,
direction_list:
Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Stir in onions until well coated. Cook, stirring occasionally, until they start to caramelize and turn golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes. You can add water, 1 tablespoon at a time, as onion mixture cooks to speed up caramelization and keep onions moist.
, Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, soy sauce, chili onion crunch, and season with salt and pepper.
, Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup pasta water.
, Transfer pasta to the skillet with caramelized onions. Toss everything together until well coated, and stir in remaining tablespoon of butter. Add reserved pasta water, if needed, a tablespoon at a time.
, Garnish with chopped parsley and Parmesan cheese, and serve.

ingredients_list: olive oil,onion,garlic,,cherry tomatoes,,white wine,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,dried Italian herb seasoning,crushed red pepper flakes,olives,fresh spinach,heavy cream,fish fillets,cooked rice or pasta (optional),fresh parsley for garnish (optional)
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
, Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in an oven-safe nonstick skillet over medium heat. When oil shimmers, add onions and cook, stirring frequently, until onions are translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in garlic, and cook, stirring, about 30 seconds.
, Add cherry tomatoes and wine, and season with salt and pepper. Add 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning and red pepper flakes. Toss to combine, and cook about 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in sliced olives, chopped spinach, and cream.
, Nestle fillets into vegetable mixture, sprinkle each fillet with salt and pepper, and drizzle remaining olive oil over the entire dish. Brush the olive oil to cover the surface of each fillet. Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning.
, Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
, Serve with hot, cooked pasta or rice, and garnish with fresh parsley.
,Any mild, firm-fleshed white fish will do, such as cod, haddock, snapper or tilapia. Fillets thicker than 1/2-inch may require more baking time.

ingredients_list: soy sauce,oyster sauce,sesame oil,rice vinegar,chili crisp,,garlic,grapeseed oil,sesame oil,broccoli florets,carrots,red bell pepper,onion,garlic, minced,shrimp,ramen noodles,sesame seeds,green onions for garnish
direction_list:
For sauce, add soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, chili crisp, and garlic to a small bowl. Heat grapeseed oil in a small saucepan. Carefully pour heated oil into the bowl; set sauce aside.
, Heat remaining 1 teaspoon sesame oil in a wok or heavy skillet. Add broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, and onion. SautÃ© until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Add garlic and stir until fragrant, about 35 seconds. Pour in sauce, and add shrimp. Cook for approximately 2 minutes.
, Meanwhile, open ramen package; discard seasoning packet. Bring 2Â½ cups water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add noodles and cook for 2 minutes. Drain; stir noodles into the wok; toss to coat. Garnish with black and white sesame seeds, and chopped green onion.
,This is meant to serve 1, but the portion is substantial and it could serve 2 with lighter appetites.

ingredients_list: boneless chicken breasts,talian seasoning,paprika,onion powder,red pepper flakes,garlic powder,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,fresh spinach,sliced mushrooms,sun-dried tomatoes,shredded mozzarella cheese,grated Parmesan cheese,heavy cream,grated Parmesan cheese,garlic, pressed,cream cheese, softened,chicken bouillon granules, ,chicken broth,oil
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Spray an 8x8-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.
, Season both sides of chicken with Italian seasoning, paprika, onion powder, pepper flakes, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Place in the prepared pan. Place spinach over chicken, mushrooms over spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes over mushrooms. Top with mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
, For sauce, beat cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic, cream cheese, chicken bouillon, chicken broth, and oil together in a bowl until just combined. Season with salt and pepper. Pour mixture over chicken.
, Bake casserole in the preheated oven until bubbly, chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 20 to 25 minutes.Â  An instant-read thermometer inserted in the center of chicken should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

ingredients_list: corn ,water,unsalted butter, cubed,fresh tarragon,lime, zested,lime juice,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Empty frozen corn into a 2-quart saucepan, and stir in water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 4 minutes. Drain well.
, Return saucepan to the stove over low heat, add butter, tarragon, lime zest, and juice. Stir until butter has melted and corn is warm, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

ingredients_list: frozen mini pie shells,pie crust,frozen mixed vegetables ,water,soft French cheese,heavy cream,cooked chicken,ground black pepper,salt to taste,egg,water
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a sheet pan with parchment paper, and place individual pie shells on the sheet. Allow refrigerated pie crust to come to room temperature on the counter, about 15 minutes.
, Place frozen vegetables into a microwave-safe dish, add water, cover, and microwave on High until hot, about 5 minutes. Drain.Â 
, Stir Boursin into vegetables until melted. Stir in cream, chicken, and black pepper; season with salt. Distribute mixture evenly among pie shells.
, Using a 3-inch round biscuit cutter, cut 8 circles from refrigerated pie crust. Place a circle on top of each pie and crimp edges together. Using a sharp knife, cut two slits in the form of an "X" in the center of each top crust. Stir egg and water together in a cup until well combined; brush each pie lightly with egg wash.Â 
, Bake in the center of the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 to 25 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove to cool on a rack about 10 minutes.
, Remove foil tins from pies and serve warm.
,Taste before adding salt. Both leftover rotisserie chicken and Boursin can be salty.,If you are crafty, use leftover dough to make designs for the top crusts. Otherwise, reserve for another purpose, or discard.

ingredients_list: low-sodium chicken broth,long grain rice,butter,shredded unpeeled zucchini,cheese,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Bring broth to a boil in a saucepan; stir in rice. Cover, reduce heat to low, and cook until rice is tender and all liquid is absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
, Remove from heat. Stir in melted butter. Add zucchini and cheese. Stir, cover and let sit until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
,Yolanda Gutierrez

ingredients_list: gnocchi,zucchini,summer squash,onion,,cherry tomatoes,tomato basil chicken sausage,olive oil,garlic cloves,Italian seasoning,pesto
direction_list:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
, Place gnocchi, zucchini, summer squash, onion, tomatoes, and sausage on a rimmed sheet pan. Drizzle olive oil evenly over mixture. Add garlic and Italian seasoning; toss to coat.
, Bake in the preheated oven until vegetables are tender, about 35 minutes. Dollop pesto over the mixture, toss to combine, and serve immediately.
,Never made pesto? ,.

ingredients_list: diced potatoes,shredded Cheddar cheese,bacon,onion,mayonnaise,garlic cloves,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,green onions
direction_list:
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Spray an 8x8-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Set aside.
, Combine potatoes, cheese, bacon, onion, mayonnaise, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Transfer to the prepared dish.Â 
, Bake until potatoes are fork tender, about 1 1/2 hours. Top with green onions.
,The easiest way to cook a small amount of bacon is

ingredients_list: mozzarella balls, or "pearls," drained,cherry tomatoes,,avocado -,fresh basil leaves, or to taste, plus more for garnish (optional),balsamic vinegar,extra-virgin olive oil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Combine mozzarella, halved cherry tomatoes, and chopped avocado in a small bowl. Tear basil leaves into pieces and sprinkle over the other ingredients.
, Drizzle on balsamic vinegar and extra virgin olive oil and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
, Divide into two serving bowls and garnish with additional fresh basil. Serve immediately.

ingredients_list: cucumbers,plain Greek yogurt, fresh lime juice ,chili sauce,ketchup, hot sauce (such as Tabasco,)
direction_list:
Place sliced cucumbers into a large bowl.
, Whisk Greek yogurt, lime juice, Thai chili sauce, ketchup, and hot sauce together in a small bowl until smooth; stir into sliced cucumbers. Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.

ingredients_list: ghee or clarified butter,onion,garlic,ginger, ,tomato,serrano pepper,carrots,green peas,russet potato,ground turmeric,ground coriander,ground cumin,fenugreek seeds,chili powder,salt,chopped cilantro, for garnish (optional)
direction_list:
Heat ghee in a large, nonstick pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring, until lightly brown, about 8 minutes. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
, Add tomato, serrano pepper, carrots, peas, potato, turmeric, coriander, cumin, fenugreek, chili powder, and salt, and cook, stirring, for about 5 minutes.
, Reduce heat to low, cover, and let vegetables steam in their own juices until potatoes are fork tender, about 25 minutes. Stir about halfway through cooking time, and make sure the pan isn't too dry. If vegetables are sticking, add 1 or 2 tablespoons water, replace the lid, and continue cooking. Taste; season with salt.
, Garnish with chopped cilantro. Serve warm, with naan, or similar flatbread.

recipe_name: Ramen Omelet with Spinach, Mushrooms, and Cheese
ingredients_list: ramen, seasoning packets discarded,butter, divided,fresh spinach,sliced mushrooms,eggs,milk,cheese,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Bring 2 cups of water to a boil in a saucepan; add ramen and cook until tender, about 3 minutes. Drain and set aside.
, Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet. Add mushrooms; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted, stirring constantly, about 2 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
, Mix eggs with splash of milk in a bowl. Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter in the same skillet. Add eggs, top with half of the ramen, 1/2 of the mushroom-spinach mixture, and 1/4 cup cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Once eggs are set, fold omelet in half and top with remaining mushroom mixture and remaining cheese.

ingredients_list: butter,onion,garlic, pressed,crushed red pepper,paprika,great northern beans,chicken broth,sun-dried tomatoes,tomato sauce,heavy cream,Parmesan cheese,spinach,basil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
direction_list:
Gather all ingredients.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai, Melt butter in a Dutch oven. Add onions and cook until soft and translucent, 5 to 6 minutes.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai, Add garlic, red pepper, and paprika; cook and stir until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai, Add beans, and cook until simmering, about 5 minutes. Mash half of the beans.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai, Stir in chicken broth, sun-dried tomatoes, and tomato sauce. Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, and stir until well combined.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai, Add spinach and basil and cook until spinach is wilted. Season with salt and pepper.
,Allrecipes/Qi Ai

ingredients_list: ears corn,mayonnaise,sour cream,grated Parmesan cheese,chopped cilantro,ground black pepper,flavored rolled tortilla chips, such as TakisÂ®
direction_list:
Heat an outdoor grill over medium-high heat. Grill corn 8 minutes. Flip and grill 8 minutes more. Remove from heat and place on a cutting board.
, Whisk mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan, cilantro, and black pepper together in a large bowl.
, Remove husks from the cob and discard. Cut corn kernels from the cob; stir into mayonnaise mixture.
, Open bags of Takis, and divide corn mixture between the bags. Top with extra Parmesan and cilantro if desired. The Takis are your dipping tool. No forks required.

recipe_name: Creamy Sage and Garlic Pork Chops
ingredients_list: rib pork chops,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,sage,olive oil,unsalted butter,sage leaves,garlic, minced,all-purpose flour,chicken broth or stock,white wine,heavy cream
direction_list:
Pat chops dry with paper towels and season both sides with salt, and pepper. Sprinkle both sides of chops with 1 teaspoon rubbed sage, and set aside.
, Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat until sizzling. Add sage leaves in a single layer and cook about 2 minutes. Turn and continue cooking until the leaves are crispy, about 2 more minutes. Remove to a paper towel to drain, then chop.
, Add seasoned chops to the same skillet and brown both sides, 3 to 5 minutes per side. Remove chops to a plate.
, Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Stir in flour and cook, stirring, until all flour is moistened with the oil and begins to bubble. Add chicken broth and stir rapidly until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes. Pour in white wine and cook, stirring, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in remaining 1/2 teaspoon rubbed sage.
, Gradually stir in cream, and simmer until sauce thickens, about 2 minutes. Return chops to the skillet, and cook in the sauce for an additional 3 to 5 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center of chops should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
, Sprinkle with chopped fried sage leaves and serve immediately.

ingredients_list: russet potatoes (,kosher salt,evaporated milk,milk,buttermilk,unsalted butter,white pepper,cayenne pepper,chives, or to taste
direction_list:
Peel and quarter potatoes, and transfer to a 6-quart pot. Add enough water to cover by 2 inches, and add 2 tablespoons kosher salt.
, Bring to a boil on high heat, stir once, and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer gently, until potatoes are completely tender, but not falling apart, 30 to 40 minutes.Â 
, When potatoes are almost done, add evaporated milk, milk, and buttermilk to a saucepan, and place over low heat. Drain potatoes very well and add to a large bowl, or back into the pot.
